metadata.notes: Phase 3b Complete: All 540 sentences with perfect grammar. Final batch (151-180) corrected with natural English contexts.

hello.sentence: I say hello to my friends.

goodbye.sentence: I say goodbye to my mother.
Goodbye everyone, have a nice day!

please.translation: هل يمكنني الحصول على ماء من فضلك؟

thank you.sentence: I say thank you every time.

sorry.sentence: I am sorry for the mistake.

excuse me.sentence: Excuse me, where is the bathroom?
Excuse me, I didn't hear you.

work.sentence: My father works in a hospital.
I work in an office every day.
My sister works in a restaurant.
We work together on this project.

job.sentence: Finding a job is important for me.
job.translation: العثور على وظيفة مهم بالنسبة لي.

job.sentence: My father has a good job.
That job is too difficult for me.
job.translation: تلك الوظيفة صعبة جداً بالنسبة لي.

time.sentence: I have no time for this.
One time I went to Paris.

day.sentence: One day I will visit you.

tomorrow.sentence: Tomorrow we will have a party.
I will see you tomorrow morning.

mother.sentence: My mother cooks dinner every day.
I love my mother very much.
My mother is at home now.

father.sentence: My father works in an office.
I help my father on weekends.
father.translation: أساعد أبي في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع.

friend.sentence: I meet my friends on Friday.

drink.sentence: She drinks coffee in the morning.

house.sentence: I live in a big house.
My house is near the school.

school.sentence: I go to school every day.

car.sentence: I go by car to work.

phone.sentence: My phone is on the table.
I call my mother on the phone.

book.sentence: I read a book every night.

old.sentence: I live in an old house.

happy.sentence: I feel happy with my life.

hard / difficult.sentence: Is this work difficult for you?
hard / difficult.translation: هل هذا العمل صعب بالنسبة لك؟

young.translation: أشعر أنني شاب، صغير السن اليوم.

wake up.sentence: Do you wake up at six?

get up.sentence: I get up and eat breakfast.
We get up early on Mondays.
When do you get up in the morning?

same.sentence: These two books are the same.
I want the same coffee as you.

different.sentence: This car is different from that one.

next.sentence: What is next on the list?
Next week I will be busy.
The next person in line is you.

question.translation: هل يمكنك الإجابة على هذا السؤال؟

question.sentence: I have a question for you.

language.sentence: Learning a new language is fun.

place.sentence: I go to that place often.

way.sentence: I know the way to school.

part.sentence: This is part of the plan.

some.translation: هل يمكني الحصول على بعض الماء؟

many.sentence: How many books do you have?

many.translation: يذهب الكثير من الطلاب إلى المدرسة.

much.sentence: How much time do you need?

well.sentence: How are you today? I'm well.

also.sentence: Can I have some too? Also yes!
also.translation: هل يمكني الحصول على بعض؟ نعم أيضاً!

because.sentence: I am happy because it's sunny.
She stayed because she was tired.
We are late because of traffic.

but.sentence: I like coffee but not tea.
She is young but very smart.
The food is good but expensive.

and.sentence: Coffee and tea are popular drinks.
